# Somali 101  
### A Community-Centered Approach to Learning the Somali Language

**Â© 2025 Liban Hussein**

**Somali 101** is a grassroots language learning initiative designed to help learners of all ages reconnect with the Somali language in a structured, supportive, and culturally rooted way.

Whether you're a heritage speaker looking to regain fluency, a complete beginner, or part of the older generation hoping to pass on your knowledge, this project is for you.  

The curriculum emphasizes **real-world communication**, **intergenerational learning**, and **accessible resources**. All materials are offered openly to empower communities to teach and learn together.

Growing up, I had a childhood friend named **Ibrahim** who Iâ€™d see during our weekend school (madrasa/dugsi). He was really bright and had a great sense of humor too.  
One day, after he passed his lesson, he was given permission to go home. Long story short, when he finished his lesson and saw his mom parked outside, he asked for permission to leave (in Somali) but did so in an interesting way. Instead of saying â€œmy mom is outsideâ€, he said something along the lines of **â€œmy mom is located outsideâ€**, using a word more suited to inanimate objects.

I was surprised that no one corrected what sounded like an obvious grammatical mistake. But I felt even worse realizing I too had made similar mistakes and had never been corrected.  
In that moment, I began to wonder â€” **was I also speaking Somali in a broken way, just like Ibrahim?**

From that day forward, I asked my friends and family to gently correct me whenever I spoke Somali incorrectly â€” even laugh a little if needed, then help me improve.  

Shortly after, I discovered a grammar book published in Mogadishu in 1973 titled  
**â€œThe Foundations of Somali Grammar (Aasaaska Naxwaha Af Soomaaliga)â€**. Alhamdulillah I've been able to translate this work into English and hope this work benefits any English-speaking Somali who wants to understand the beauty and structure of our mother tongue.
